BloodyMary.Name: Bloody Mary
BloodyMary.Tip: Damage, critical strike chance, movement speed, and melee speed boosted during a Blood Moon, life regen and defense reduced
BloodyMary.TipTranslation: 伤害、暴击、移动速度和近战速度在血月、生命恢复和防御中提升

CaribbeanRum.Name: Caribbean Rum
CaribbeanRum.Tip: Life regen, movement speed, and wing flight time boosted, you are floaty and defense is reduced
CaribbeanRum.TipTranslation: 生命回复，移动速度，飞行时间增加，，防御能力降低

CinnamonRoll.Name: Cinnamon Roll
CinnamonRoll.Tip: Mana regen rate and fire weapon damage boosted, defense reduced
CinnamonRoll.TipTranslation: 法力回复率和火焰武器伤害提升，防御减少

Everclear.Name: Everclear
Everclear.Tip: Damage and critical strike chance boosted, life regen and defense reduced
Everclear.TipTranslation: 伤害和暴击提升，生命恢复和防御减少

EvergreenGin.Name: Evergreen Gin
EvergreenGin.Tip: Nature-based weapon damage and damage reduction boosted, life regen reduced
EvergreenGin.TipTranslation: 基于自然的武器伤害和减伤提升，生命回复减少

Fireball.Tip: Fire weapon damage boosted, life regen reduced
Fireball.TipTranslation: 火力武器伤害提升，生命回复减少

GrapeBeer.Name: Grape Beer
GrapeBeer.Tip: Life regen, defense, and movement speed reduced
GrapeBeer.TipTranslation: 生命恢复、防御和移动速度降低

Margarita.Name: Margarita
Margarita.Tip: Immunity to most debuffs, defense and life regen reduced
Margarita.TipTranslation: 免疫对大多数减益效果，防御和生命再生降低

Moonshine.Name: Moonshine
Moonshine.Tip: Defense and damage reduction boosted, life regen reduced
Moonshine.TipTranslation: 防御和减少伤害提升，生命回复减少

MoscowMule.Name: Moscow Mule
MoscowMule.Tip: Damage, critical strike chance, and knockback boosted, life regen reduced
MoscowMule.TipTranslation: 伤害、暴击，生命回复减少

Rum.Name: Rum
Rum.Tip: Movement speed and life regen boosted, defense reduced
Rum.TipTranslation: 移动速度和生命重获提升，防御减少

Screwdriver.Name: Screwdriver
Screwdriver.Tip: Piercing projectile damage boosted, life regen reduced
Screwdriver.TipTranslation: 穿透弹伤害增强，生命回复减少

StarBeamRye.Name: Star Beam Rye
StarBeamRye.Tip: Max mana, magic damage, and magic critical strike chance boosted, defense, mana usage, and life regen reduced
StarBeamRye.TipTranslation: 最大法力、魔法伤害和魔法爆击几率增加、防御、法力使用和生命回复减少

Tequila.Name: Tequila
Tequila.Tip: Damage, critical strike chance, damage reduction, defense, and knockback boosted during daytime, life regen reduced
Tequila.TipTranslation: 伤害，暴击率，减伤，防御在白天增加，生命回复减少

TequilaSunrise.Name: Tequila Sunrise
TequilaSunrise.Tip: Damage, critical strike chance, damage reduction, defense, and knockback boosted during daytime, life regen reduced
TequilaSunrise.TipTranslation: 伤害，暴击率，减伤，防御在白天增加，生命回复减少

Vodka.Name: Vodka
Vodka.Tip: Damage and critical stike chance boosted, defense and life regen reduced
Vodka.TipTranslation: 伤害和暴击增加，防御和生命恢复减少

Whiskey.Name: Whiskey
Whiskey.Tip: Damage, critical strike chance, and knockback boosted, defense reduced
Whiskey.TipTranslation: 伤害、暴击增强，防御减少

WhiteWine.Name: White Wine
WhiteWine.Tip: Magic damage boosted, life regen and defense reduced
WhiteWine.TipTranslation: 魔法伤害提升，生命再生和防御减少

AbyssalDivingSuitBuff.Name: Abyssal Diving Suit
AbyssalDivingSuitBuff.TipTranslation: 哇哦，这就像是一个金属打造成的人

AbyssalDivingSuitPlates.Name: Abyssal Diving Suit Plates
AbyssalDivingSuitPlates.TipTranslation: 这些板子能吸收25%的伤害

AbyssalWeapon.Name: Abyssal Weapon
AbyssalWeapon.Tip: Melee weapons inflict abyssal flames, 15% increased movement speed
AbyssalWeapon.TipTranslation: 近战武器攻击会附带深渊灾火效果，增加15%近战速度

AnechoicCoating.Name: Anechoic Coating
AnechoicCoating.TipTranslation: 减少深渊生物探测你的机会

AngryChicken.Name: Son of Yharon
AngryChicken.Tip: The Son of Yharon will protect you
AngryChicken.TipTranslation:
丛林龙之子将会保护你

AquaticStar.Name: Aquatic Star
AquaticStar.Tip: The aquatic star will protect you

ArmorCrunch.Name: Armor Crunch
ArmorCrunch.TipTranslation:
你的盔甲被撕裂了
降低66.67%的防御

Backfire.Name: Backfire
Backfire.Tip: Damage, defense, and wing time drastically reduced
Backfire.TipTranslation: 伤害，防御和飞行时间大幅减少

BloodClot.Name: Blood Clot
BloodClot.Tip: The blood clot will protect you
BloodClot.TipTranslation:
凝血块将会保护你
'你觉得这能吃吗'

BrimlingBuff.Name: Brimling
BrimlingBuff.Tip: Protect her or suffer in agony
BrimlingBuff.TipTranslation:
要么保护她，要么忍受痛苦
玩家血量低于25%时，会缩进壳里

BrimstoneMount.Name: Brimrose Mount
BrimstoneMount.Tip: The seat is toasty.  That is all
BrimstoneMount.TipTranslation:
坐起来很暖和，仅此而已
比UFO更好！不过如果你在空中飘太久，它会缓降

BrimstoneWaifu.Name: Brimstone Waifu
BrimstoneWaifu.Tip: The brimstone elemental will protect you
BrimstoneWaifu.TipTranslation: 硫磺火元素将会保护你

BrittleStar.Name: Brittle Star
BrittleStar.Tip: The brittle star will protect you

CalamitasEyes.Name: Blighted Eyes
CalamitasEyes.Tip: Calamitas and her brothers will protect you
CalamitasEyes.TipTranslation: 灾厄与她的兄弟们将会保护你

ChaosSpirit.Name: Chaos Spirit
ChaosSpirit.Tip: The chaos spirit will protect you

ChibiiBuff.Name: Chibii Devourer

CloudyWaifu.Name: Cloudy Waifu
CloudyWaifu.Tip: The cloud elemental will protect you

Corroslime.Name: Corroslime
Corroslime.TipTranslation:
迷你史莱姆将会保护你

CosmicEnergy.Name: Cosmic Energy
CosmicEnergy.Tip: The cosmic energy will protect you

CosmicFreeze.Name: Cosmic Freeze

CosmicFreeze.TipTranslation: 你感受到了来自广阔的太空的极寒

Crimslime.Name: Crimslime
Crimslime.TipTranslation: 猩红史莱姆将会保护你

DaedalusCrystal.Name: Daedalus Crystal
DaedalusCrystal.Tip: The daedalus crystal will protect you

DankCreeper.Name: Dank Creeper

DankCreeper.TipTranslation: 阴湿爬行者将会保护你

DrewsSandyWaifu.Name: Sandy Waifu
DrewsSandyWaifu.Tip: The sand elemental will protect you

ElementalAxe.Name: Elemental Axe
ElementalAxe.Tip: The elemental axe will protect you

Enraged.Name: Enraged
Enraged.Tip: Enemies are enraged and do 1.5 times damage
Enraged.TipTranslation: 敌人被激怒，造成1.5倍的伤害

ExtremeGrav.Name: Extreme Gravity
ExtremeGrav.Tip: Your wing time is reduced by 66%, infinite flight is disabled
ExtremeGrav.TipTranslation: 翅膀飞行时间减少75%,无法无限飞行

ExtremeGravity.Name: Icarus' Folly
ExtremeGravity.Tip: Your wing time is reduced by 75%, infinite flight is disabled
ExtremeGravity.TipTranslation: 翅膀飞行时间减少75%，无法无限飞行

Fab.Name: Alicorn
Fab.Tip: You beat DoG while drunk, you are truly fabulous!
Fab.TipTranslation: 你在醉酒的时候打败了神明吞噬者，你太厉害了！

FishAlert.Name: Fish Alert
FishAlert.Tip: The abyssal creatures have spotted you!

FungalClump.Name: Fungal Clump
FungalClump.Tip: The fungal clump will protect you
FungalClump.TipTranslation: 夜光蘑菇丛将会保护你

GlacialState.Name: Glacial State
GlacialState.Tip: Cannot move and defense is shattered
GlacialState.TipTranslation: 无法动弹，防御减弱一半

GodSlayerCooldown.Name: God Slayer Cooldown
GodSlayerCooldown.Tip: 10% increase to all damage; godslayer effect is recharging
GodSlayerCooldown.TipTranslation: 增加10%全伤害; 神影套装效果正在再生

GraxDefense.Name: Grax Boost
GraxDefense.Tip: Your defenses and muscles are strong
GraxDefense.TipTranslation: 你的防御和力量变得强大了

HeartAttack.Name: Heart Attack
HeartAttack.Tip: You survived a heart attack.  Boosts life regen and max life.
HeartAttack.TipTranslation: 你在一次心脏病发作中幸免于难. 提升20%最大生命值，增加生命恢复.

HolyInferno.Name: Holy Inferno
HolyInferno.Tip: You've gone too far from the Profaned God!

Horror.Name: Horror
Horror.TipTranslation:
你很害怕...
防御减半，降低移动速度，伴随有黑暗效果

IceClasper.Name: Ice Clasper
IceClasper.Tip: The ice clasper will protect you
IceClasper.TipTranslation: 极地吞噬怪将会保护你

IceShieldBuff.Name: Ice Shield
IceShieldBuff.Tip: The shield will absorb 50% damage from one hit before breaking
IceShieldBuff.TipTranslation: 冰盾将会在破裂之前吸收50%伤害

Invincible.Name: Invincible
Invincible.Tip: Immune to damage and most debuffs

Irradiated.Name: Irradiated
Irradiated.TipTranslation:
你的皮肤正在燃烧
在地底层会消失
既有益也有害

Mechworm.Name: Mechworm
Mechworm.TipTranslation: 噬神机械虫将会保护你

Mushy.Name: Mushy
Mushy.Tip: Increased defense by 10 and increased life regen by 5
Mushy.TipTranslation: 增加10点防御和5点生命恢复

Omniscience.Name: Omniscience
Omniscience.TipTranslation: 获得矿物勘探，生物探测，危险探测效果

RageMode.Name: Rage Mode
RageMode.Tip: 100% (400% in Death Mode) increased damage.  Can be boosted by other items up to 160% (640% in Death Mode).
RageMode.TipTranslation: 增加100%（死亡模式400%）的伤害。可以使用其他物品增至160%（死亡模式640%）伤害

ReaverOrb.Name: Reaver Orb
ReaverOrb.Tip: The reaver orb will protect you

RedDevil.Tip: The red devil will protect you

SandyWaifu.Name: Sandy Waifu
SandyWaifu.Tip: The sand elemental will protect you

ScarfCooldown.Name: Scarf Cooldown
ScarfCooldown.TipTranslation: 你的躲避技巧正在冷却

ScarfMeleeBoost.TipTranslation: 增加10%全武器伤害和暴击

SirenLure.Name: Siren Lure
SirenLure.Tip: The siren lure will protect you

SirenWaterSpeed.Name: Siren Speed
SirenWaterSpeed.TipTranslation: 最大速度和加速度增加了15%

SlimeGod.Name: Baby Slime God
SlimeGod.Tip: The slime god will protect you
SlimeGod.TipTranslation: 史莱姆之神将会保护你

SolarSpirit.Name: Solar Spirit
SolarSpirit.Tip: The solar spirit will protect you

SolarSpiritGod.Name: Solar God Spirit
SolarSpiritGod.Tip: The solar god spirit will protect you

SpiritGeneratorDefBuff.Name: Spirit Defense
SpiritGeneratorDefBuff.Tip: Defense boosted by 5 and damage reduction boosted by 5%
SpiritGeneratorDefBuff.TipTranslation: 防御增加5，增加5%伤害减免

SquishyBeanBuff.Name: Squishy Bean
SquishyBeanBuff.Tip: BEAN MAN. BEAN DO T H E  B EA N IS HER E
SquishyBeanBuff.TipTranslation: BEAN MAN. BEAN DO T H E  B EA N IS HER E

TitanScale.Name: Titan Scale
TitanScale.TipTranslation: 你感觉到自己像个坦克

TyrantsFury.Name: Tyrant's Fury
TyrantsFury.Tip: 30% increased melee damage and crit chance
TyrantsFury.TipTranslation: 增加30%的近战伤害和暴击

WeakPetrification.Name: Weak Petrification
WeakPetrification.TipTranslation: 你的垂直运动能力变弱了

YharimPower.Name: Yharim's Power
YharimPower.Tip: You feel like you can break the world in two...with your bare hands!
YharimPower.TipTranslation: 你感觉到能将世界撕成两半...仅仅用你的双手

Zen.Name: Zen
Zen.TipTranslation: 因为你的心很平静，所以你的周围也是很平静的
